Articles.Content: iam trying to make an edf afterburner for attaining double the thrust obtained from the edf. how come the flame holders helps in creating the thrust???

I do not think you should make an after burner for a duct fan. Flame holders are used to make sure the flame isn't blown out by the rapid acceleration of air through the engine.

PS: I really do no think you should do this especially to an electric duct fan. If your machine fails it will catastrophically and unsafely.
